definitions.definition: In a fortuitous manner; in a manner of happening by chance ; coincidentally ; accidentally .
In a fortuitous manner; in a manner of happening by a lucky chance; luckily ; fortunately .

main_definition: In a fortuitous manner; in a manner of happening by chance ; coincidentally ; accidentally .
secondary_definitions: ( sometimes proscribed ) In a fortuitous manner; in a manner of happening by a lucky chance; luckily ; fortunately .
